title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Types of warships: principal dimensions and form coefficients, warship design procedures, general arrangement, special hull forms. Design considerations: mass and space, stability, hydrodynamics (resistance, propulsion, seakeeping, manoeuvring), survivability, strength, cost effectiveness, reliability and maintainability, vibration. Ship measurements: deadweight, capacity and tonnage. Machinery and equipment: propulsion, power generation, boats and davits. Systems design: piping, electrical distribution, air conditioning and ventilation, cathodic protection.
